name: CVE-2016-1912
description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Dolibarr ERP/CRM 3.8.3 allow remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (1) lastname, (2) firstname, (3) email, (4) job, or (5) signature parameter to htdocs/user/card.php.

external_references.description: This object was created using cve2stix from the Signals Corps.
